author: Chillingworth, William, 1602-1644.
publisher: Printed by D. Maxwell for Timothy Garthwait,
notes: Wing C3887B = Wing C3888. DFo copy of Wing C3887B, dated in imprint with same defective type '2' as Wing C3888. Imprimitur is dated: Sextil. 5. 1662.
